A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Last Jedi was a bomb! It bombed my last hope (the spark has gone out!) for the future of the Star Wars universe. As far as I'm concerned there is no need for further sequels because:
1. Abrams is coming back to administer the killing blow for Episode 9\, 
2. Rey's mysterious past is a dead end (every pun intended) and 
3. The big villainous cheese was killed off! 
I truly went into ep 8 with the hopes that it would be tons better than ep 7 but alas I was wrong and it is now time for Star Was to end!
